meanings.definition: A person who receives income from property or investments.
meanings.sent1: The rentiers in our neighborhood own many houses and receive money every month.
meanings.sent2: My uncle is one of the rentiers who earns a living by renting out apartments.
meanings.sent3: The rentiers at the meeting joked about their passive income streams.
meanings.sent4: She envied the rentiers for their ability to make money while they slept.
meanings.sent5: The image of the rentiers counting their profits was etched in his mind.

meanings.sent1: The rentiers gathered for a conference to discuss their investments.
meanings.sent2: In the room, there were many rentiers sharing stories of their financial successes.
meanings.sent3: The rentiers decided to pool their resources for a joint venture.
meanings.sent4: The rentiers stood out in their fancy suits and expensive watches.
meanings.sent5: The group of rentiers exuded an air of sophistication and wealth.
